title: ENDED: WTTF: PSA Cobbs, WTT: 1951 Mantle RC
author: GoBigRed

posts.post_title: ENDED: WTTF: PSA Cobbs, WTT: 1951 Mantle RC
posts.post_content:
ENDED: 19 APR 19

Looking to trade my 1951 Bowman Mantle RC PSA-4 for a T206 PSA Cobb.

Please reply to [url]arkansas2014@gmail.com[/url]

Steve
